Class SplitterRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.recommenders.rival.split.splitter.SplitterRunner

extends Object
    Class that splits a dataset according to some properties.

      • run

        public static void run(Properties properties,
       DataModel<Long,Long> data,
       boolean doDataClear)
                throws ClassNotFoundException,
                       FileNotFoundException
        Runs a Splitter instance based on the properties.
        Parameters:
        properties - property file
        data - the data to be split
        doDataClear - flag to clear the memory used for the data before saving the splits
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException - when
        FileNotFoundException - when

      • saveDataModel

                 String outfile,
                 boolean overwrite)
                          throws FileNotFoundException
        Method that saves a data model to a file.
        Parameters:
        model - model to be saved
        outfile - file where the model will be saved
        overwrite - flag that indicates if the file should be overwritten
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - when
